title: Logical Extreme is Looking For New Players For Our Gold/Plat Team
body:
Logical Extreme is a serious team who will be competing in the Compete League Gold/Plat Open League
We will be holding practices and team skrims on Thursdays and Fridays 10-10:30 EST.
We are a serious team, this means there is a 100% no toxicity policy, and you will need to be there for practices / vod reviews, commitment is key.

We are currently looking for 

* Middle
* ADC
* ( subs for each role )


Discord is required
Fill out This Application to apply,** DO NOT ADD ME**

Summoner Name:
Age:
Current Rank:
Role:
Top 5 Champions:
Discord?:
Any Past Experience?:
What differentiates you from others who are applying?:

We will be holding tryouts today (3/12/2017) at 8:00 EST
Hope to see you there :)
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Summoner Name: donekiddo
Age: 18
Current Rank: G5
Role: ADC
Top 5 Champions: Caitlyn, Ezreal, Lucian, Jhin, Varus
Discord?: Yes
Any Past Experience?: I have lots of experience in competitive environments and I am good in these environments.
What differentiates you from others who are applying?: I am a potential shotcaller but also listen to calls very well.

Summoner Name: rÃ¨mzi (alt 138)
Age: 17
Current Rank: G3
Role: Mid
Top 5 Champions: Ekko, Viktor, Twisted Fate, Syndra, Ahri
Discord?: Yes
Any Past Experience?: Played on quite alot of teams and a few orgs and have got some pretty good tournament finishes
What differentiates you from others who are applying?: Im on everyday trying to improve and be the best I can

Summoner Name: Subiimationz
Age: 17 (mature)
Current Rank: Plat 3
Role: Mid
Top 5 Champions: Katarina, Twisted fate, Syndra, Orianna, Ahri 
Discord?: Yes
Any Past Experience?: I was on a a team last season that averaged at D2. I was D4 last season. I have played Mid for a few different teams and have only split with them because of issues with players not being committed
What differentiates you from others who are applying?: I am on at 3est-2est every day, All day weekends. You will have zero scheduling issues with me and i am looking for a committed team.

Summoner Name: ST5R Tiger
Age: 19
Current Rank: Plat 5
Role: ADC
Top 5 Champions: Jinx, Draven, Jhin, Ashe, kalista
Discord?: Yes
Any Past Experience?: Been in many teams and they became social teams and not full teams where we pratice everyday which is what i want.
What differentiates you from others who are applying?: I have a really competitive attitude when it comes to scrimming and playing other teams and also i have the joker side where when we need to be cheered up ill be there and give u guys a laugh.
